title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When new files are created on Windows, they currently have Windows line delimiters.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters, as the end product is a Unix product.
SR: Consider the following scenario: Unix and Windows workstations are used to develop a Unix product/program. There should be a UI (Preference) in the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench to ensure all plugins use the same line delimiter for new files.
